title: AWS Cloud Accounts API Overview
description: To monitor the resources on your AWS cloud infrastructure, you must first add your AWS accounts to Prisma Cloud. When you add your cloud account to Prisma Cloud, the API integration between AWS and Prisma Cloud is established and you can begin monitoring the resources and identify potential security risks.
